mapper.select: select a.id,a.incoming_id,a.shop_short_name,a.legal_mobile,a.agent_mobile, c.`name` legalName,c.sex legalSex, c.nationality legalNationality,c.id_no legalIdNo,c.front_id_card_url legalFrontIdCardUrl,c.back_id_card_url legalBackIdCardUrl, c.hold_id_card_url legalHoldIdCardUrl,c.id_effective_date legalIdEffectiveDate,c.id_expiry_date legalIdExpiryDate, c.is_long_term legalIdIsLongTerm,d.`name` agentName,d.id_no agentIdNo,d.id_effective_date agentIdEffectiveDate, d.id_expiry_date agentIdExpiryDate,d.is_long_term agentIdIsLongTerm from tf_incoming_merchant_info a left join tf_incoming_info b on a.incoming_id = b.id left join tf_idcard_info c on a.legal_id_card = c.id left join tf_idcard_info d on a.agent_id_card= d.id where b.id = #{id};
